rows.label: xs31200100_MSG0010
rows.name:
I have the technicians' report.
Here's what it says.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31200100_MSG0020
rows.name:
The first major thing we discovered through
analyzing the Ares is the following:[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31200100_MSG0030
rows.name: the universe in which planet Mira exists—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31200100_MSG0040
rows.name: though it might be better to say "dimension"—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31200100_MSG0050
rows.name:
is not the only one, as we have now detected
several others outside of it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31200100_MSG0060
rows.name: We're talking "parallel dimensions."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31200100_MSG0070
rows.name: This might be hard to wrap your heads around, but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31200100_MSG0080
rows.name: after the battle that ended with the White Whale crashing,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31200100_MSG0090
rows.name: me and the Ares were cast into a space between all those.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31200100_MSG0100
rows.name:
The navigational data from the Ares backs up
the existence of the place he's talking about.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31200100_MSG0110
rows.name: What's more, our previous attempts to find the Lifehold Core,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31200100_MSG0120
rows.name:
and our studies of the floating landmass Volitaris,
which accompanied Void,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31200100_MSG0130
rows.name: have all led us to hypothesize such a possibility.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31200100_MSG0140
rows.name:
The new data we got from the Ares
has helped us tie this all together.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31200100_MSG0150
rows.name: It's led us to the truth of the matter.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31200100_MSG0160
rows.name:
When Void said that he brought worlds into concord,
this is what he was hinting at then?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31200100_MSG0170
rows.name:
Based on these findings, we have concluded
that the universe that Earth belonged to,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31200100_MSG0180
rows.name:
and the universe that we're in now with Mira,
are in fact completely separate.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31200100_MSG0190
rows.name: Plus...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31200100_MSG0200
rows.name:
we now know that the past universe,
at the point of Earth's destruction,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31200100_MSG0210
rows.name: disappeared entirely along with it...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31200100_MSG0220
rows.name: The whole UNIVERSE?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31200100_MSG0230
rows.name:
Void's catchphrase... "The bested cease to be"—
this is what he meant.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31200100_MSG0240
rows.name: But then, what does this fact tell us?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31200100_JNK0010
rows.name: Nod Off

rows.label: xs31200100_SEL0010
rows.name: Let your eyelids droop...

rows.label: xs31200100_MSG0250
rows.name: Snap to, kid, it's not recess yet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31200100_MSG0260
rows.name: It tells us...that we, on Mira, are the survivors.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31200100_MSG0270
rows.name: Atta boy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31200100_MSG0280
rows.name: That's right.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31200100_MSG0290
rows.name:
We managed to escape the destruction of the Earth's universe,
and came to this one.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31200100_MSG0300
rows.name: We survived—isn't that proof enough?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31200100_JNK0020
rows.name: Deduce

rows.label: xs31200100_SEL0020
rows.name: Point out that humanity lives on.

rows.label: xs31200100_MSG0310
rows.name: A+.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31200100_MSG0320
rows.name: Yes, humanity still endures on Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31200100_MSG0330
rows.name: So...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31200100_MSG0340
rows.name:
we managed to escape the destruction of the Earth's universe,
and came to this one.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31200100_MSG0350
rows.name: We survived—isn't that proof enough?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31200100_MSG0360
rows.name: That day...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31200100_MSG0370
rows.name:
the destruction of the universe caused
a massive energy displacement...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31200100_MSG0380
rows.name:
and that's what allowed us to escape to Mira,
by luck bordering on the miraculous?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31200100_MSG0390
rows.name:
It's just back-of-the-envelope logic based off of
old records...but that sounds about right.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31200100_MSG0400
rows.name: So then...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31200100_MSG0410
rows.name:
If we could produce an amount of energy
roughly equal in magnitude, then hypothetically...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31200100_MSG0420
rows.name:
it just may be possible to escape from
this universe as it disappears?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31200100_MSG0430
rows.name: Okay, but...is that kind of thing physically achievable...?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31200100_MSG0440
rows.name: ...Oh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31200100_MSG0450
rows.name: That's right. That's where the Ares comes in.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31200100_MSG0460
rows.name: Rather...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31200100_MSG0470
rows.name: the cores that're the source of its power.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31200100_MSG0480
rows.name: So that's why Void made a beeline straight for it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31200100_MSG0490
rows.name:
Our battle had already begun—
you just didn't know it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31200100_MSG0500
rows.name: And hence...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31200100_MSG0510
rows.name: that slimy bastard threw the first punch.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31200100_MSG0520
rows.name: Nagi.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31200100_MSG0530
rows.name:
We'll need a strategy if we're gonna pull through.
And I mean yesterday.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31200100_MSG0540
rows.name: Quite...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31200100_MSG0550
rows.name: I'll reach out to Maurice at once.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31200100_MSG0560
rows.name: Thanks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31200100_MSG0570
rows.name:
And we won't be able to make it
without help from all the other races.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31200100_MSG0580
rows.name: Everyone, your orders.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31200100_MSG0590
rows.name:
Until we have a strategy in place,
attend to your usual duties.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31200100_MSG0600
rows.name: Sir.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31200100_MSG0610
rows.name: Yes, sir.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31200100_MSG0620
rows.name: Al... Seeing as you're unemployed...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31200100_MSG0630
rows.name:
I'm conscripting you—
go lend your buddies a hand.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31200100_MSG0640
rows.name: Sounds more like being press-ganged...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31200100_MSG0650
rows.name: Call it what you like, you gotta earn your keep.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31200100_MSG0660
rows.name: Tch... Fine, you win.[ST:wait ]
